CustomField.description: Formula field to display SSP Role. This is a workaround field to get application created by user role. This needs to be deprecated once Application object starts storing the user role.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula field to display SSP Role. This is a workaround field to get application created by user role. This needs to be deprecated once Application object starts storing the user role.
CustomField.label: SSP Role
